data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Cthulhu is one of the Great Old Ones, a group of powerful beings from another place that now inhabit Earth, waiting to rise up(when the stars are right) and destroy the human race so they can rule the planet. The Old Ones ____ neither ____ nor ____, ____ that ____ do ____ hate ____, ____ just ____ not ____ about ____. They ____ of ____ as ____ they ____ be ____. Also, their appearance is so unlike anything of this world, that it is said that any human who so much as gazes upon one of them will go insane.
data.partBlankContent: Cthulhu is one of the Great Old Ones, a group of powerful beings from another place that now inhabit Earth, waiting to rise up(when the stars are right) and destroy the human race so they can rule the planet. The Old Ones a__ neither go__ nor ev__, mea____ that th__ do n__ hate hum___, th__ just d_ not ca__ about th__. They th___ of hum___ as i_ they co___ be an__. Also, their appearance is so unlike anything of this world, that it is said that any human who so much as gazes upon one of them will go insane.
data.fullContent: Cthulhu is one of the Great Old Ones, a group of powerful beings from another place that now inhabit Earth, waiting to rise up(when the stars are right) and destroy the human race so they can rule the planet. The Old Ones are neither good nor evil, meaning that they do not hate humans, they just do not care about them. They think of humans as if they could be ants. Also, their appearance is so unlike anything of this world, that it is said that any human who so much as gazes upon one of them will go insane.
data.answer: 克苏鲁是古老的伟大生物之一，他们是一群来自另一个地方的强大生物，现在居住在地球上，等待着崛起(当恒星是正确的)并摧毁人类，以便他们可以统治这个星球。旧的既不善良也不邪恶，这意味着它们不憎恨人类，只是不关心人类。他们认为人类就像蚂蚁一样。而且，它们的外表与这个世界上的任何东西都不一样，据说任何一个人只要看到它们之一，就会发疯。
